trans-unit.source: The host control whose property is being mapped.
trans-unit.target: O controle de host cuja propriedade está sendo mapeada.

trans-unit.source: The host control is either a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> or an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" />.
trans-unit.target: O controle de host é um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> ou um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property being translated.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade que está sendo traduzida.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the property.
Provides a translation function for a mapped property of the host control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma função de tradução de uma propriedade mapeada do controle de host.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator> delegate is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap> class to implement property mapping between [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator> delegado é usado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap> classe para implementar o mapeamento de propriedade entre [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações, consulte [Windows Forms e mapeamento de propriedade do WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
